content: lion brand pattern # 10046 *cms-easybabysweater pdf* skill level easy size newborn 3-6 mos 12 mos 18 mos finished chest 21½ 23 24½ 26 inches #910 microspun *some colors in original pattern have been discontinued * a lilac 2 balls b c 1 ball each lime coral 3 colors 4 balls total crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm four buttons pattern puff pieces front back sleeves 2 back and front are worked in puff in stripe sequence sleeves are worked in double_crochet u s see easy on baby sweater 1 for the cotton-ease / vanna s choice version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-on-baby-sweater
